Botox.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a substance that makes muscles relax, which can be injected into the skin around someone's eyes to make the lines disappear and the skin look younger and more attractive
Botox.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to use Botox to remove lines on your face
Botox.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He Botoxed his forehead before the next film.
